Title: Socialized Medicine
Description:
It has come to my attention that the most downtrodden residents of the Burrows have fallen prey to some sort of malady.

Take this potion and dose the sick. This will strengthen the citizens and curtail further outbreak.
ObjectivesText: Dose Downtrodden Residents with Nizrek's potion.
CompletionText: Have you aided the residents of the Burrows?
RewardText: I will not allow their suffering.
